import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddAccount = () => { const [account,setAccount] = useState({ username:"", password:"", fname:"", lname:"", gender:"", email:"", type:"", }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ setAccount((prev) => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } return (
